GCD.Name: Hard Slash
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 260.

GCD.Name: Syphon Strike
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 220.
Combo Action: Hard Slash
Combo Potency: 360
Combo Bonus: Restores MP

GCD.Name: Unleash
GCD.Description: Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.

GCD.Name: Unmend
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 150.
Additional Effect: Increased enmity
Additional Effect: Reduces the recast time of Shadowstride by 5 seconds

GCD.Name: Souleater
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 240.
Combo Action: Syphon Strike
Combo Potency: 460
Combo Bonus: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 300
Combo Bonus: Increases Blood Gauge by 20

GCD.Name: Stalwart Soul
GCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 120 to all nearby enemies.
Combo Action: Unleash
Combo Potency: 160
Combo Bonus: Restores MP
Combo Bonus: Increases Blood Gauge by 20

GCD.Name: Bloodspiller
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 580.</br>Blood Gauge Cost: 50

GCD.Name: Quietus
GCD.Description: Delivers an attack with a potency of 240 to all nearby enemies.</br>Blood Gauge Cost: 50

GCD.Name: Scarlet Delirium
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 600.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Bloodspiller changes to Scarlet Delirium while under the effect of Delirium.

GCD.Name: Comeuppance
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 700.
Combo Action: Scarlet Delirium
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Scarlet Delirium changes to Comeuppance when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Torcleaver
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 800.
Combo Action: Comeuppance
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Comeuppance changes to Torcleaver when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Impalement
GCD.Description:
Delivers an attack with a potency of 320 to all nearby enemies.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Can only be executed while under the effect of Delirium.

※This action cannot be assigned to a hotbar.
※Quietus changes to Impalement when requirements for execution are met.

GCD.Name: Disesteem
GCD.Description: Deals physical damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 800 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.</br>Can only be executed while Scorn is active.

OGCD.Name: Grit
OGCD.Description: Significantly increases enmity generation.</br>Effect ends upon reuse.

OGCD.Name: Release Grit
OGCD.Description: Cancels the effect of Grit.

OGCD.Name: Flood of Darkness
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 100 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Edge of Darkness.

OGCD.Name: Blood Weapon
OGCD.Description:
Grants 3 stacks of Blood Weapon, each stack increasing Blood Gauge by 10 and restoring MP upon landing weaponskills or spells.
Duration: 15s
Effect does not stack when hitting multiple targets with a single attack.

OGCD.Name: Shadow Wall
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 30%.
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Edge of Darkness
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 300.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Flood of Darkness.

OGCD.Name: Dark Mind
OGCD.Description:
Reduces magic vulnerability by 20%.
Duration: 10s

OGCD.Name: Living Dead
OGCD.Description:
Grants the effect of Living Dead.
When HP is reduced to 0 while under the effect of Living Dead, instead of becoming KO'd, your status will change to Walking Dead.
Living Dead Duration: 10s
Additional Effect: Restores HP with each weaponskill successfully delivered or spell cast
Cure Potency: 1500
While under the effect of Walking Dead, most attacks will not lower your HP below 1. If, before the Walking Dead timer runs out, an amount of HP totaling your maximum HP is restored, the effect will change to Undead Rebirth. If this amount is not restored, you will be KO'd.
Walking Dead Duration: 10s
While under the effect of Undead Rebirth, most attacks will not lower your HP below 1.
Undead Rebirth Duration: Time remaining on Walking Dead

OGCD.Name: Salted Earth
OGCD.Description:
Creates a patch of salted earth at your feet, dealing unaspected damage with a potency of 50 to any enemies who enter.
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Shadowstride
OGCD.Description:
Rush to a targeted enemy's location.
Maximum Charges: 2
Cannot be executed while bound.

OGCD.Name: Abyssal Drain
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 240 to target and all enemies nearby it.
Additional Effect: Restores own HP
Cure Potency: 200
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Shares a recast timer with Carve and Spit.

OGCD.Name: Carve and Spit
OGCD.Description:
Delivers a threefold attack with a potency of 510.
Additional Effect: Restores MP
Shares a recast timer with Abyssal Drain.

OGCD.Name: Delirium
OGCD.Description:
Grants 3 stacks of Delirium and Blood Weapon.
Delirium Effect: Changes Bloodspiller to Scarlet Delirium and Quietus to Impalement
Duration: 15s
Blood Weapon Effect: Each stack increases Blood Gauge by 10 and restores MP upon landing weaponskills or spells
Duration: 15s
Effect does not stack when hitting multiple targets with a single attack.

OGCD.Name: The Blackest Night
OGCD.Description:
Creates a barrier around self or target party member that absorbs damage totaling 25% of target's maximum HP.
Duration: 7s
Grants Dark Arts when barrier is completely absorbed.
Dark Arts Effect: Consume Dark Arts instead of MP to execute Edge of Shadow or Flood of Shadow

OGCD.Name: Flood of Shadow
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 160 to all enemies in a straight line before you.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Edge of Shadow.

OGCD.Name: Edge of Shadow
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage with a potency of 460.
Additional Effect: Grants Darkside, increasing damage dealt by 10%
Duration: 30s
Extends Darkside duration by 30s to a maximum of 60s.
Shares a recast timer with Flood of Shadow.

OGCD.Name: Dark Missionary
OGCD.Description:
Reduces magic damage taken by self and nearby party members by 10%.
Duration: 15s

OGCD.Name: Living Shadow
OGCD.Description:
Conjure a simulacrum of your darkside to fight alongside you.
Duration: 20s
Additional Effect: Grants Scorn
Duration: 30s
Simulacrum Attack Potency: 420
Additional Effect: Simulacrum is able to execute Shadowbringer and Disesteem
Shadowbringer Potency: 570 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies
Disesteem Potency: 620 for the first enemy, and 25% less for all remaining enemies

OGCD.Name: Oblation
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by target party member or self by 10%.
Duration: 10s
Maximum Charges: 2

OGCD.Name: Salt and Darkness
OGCD.Description: All enemies standing in the corrupted patch of Salted Earth take additional unaspected damage with a potency of 500 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.

OGCD.Name: Shadowbringer
OGCD.Description:
Deals unaspected damage to all enemies in a straight line before you with a potency of 600 for the first enemy, and 50% less for all remaining enemies.
Maximum Charges: 2
Can only be executed while under the effect of Darkside.

OGCD.Name: Shadowed Vigil
OGCD.Description:
Reduces damage taken by 40%.
Duration: 15s
Additional Effect: Grants Vigilant
Duration: 20s
Vigilant Effect: Restores HP when HP falls below 50% or upon effect duration expiration
Cure Potency: 1,200
